name: typebot
description: Typebot is a self-hosted conversational form and chatbot builder that lets you design flows visually and embed them on websites. It supports integrations and webhooks and is also available as a cloud service.
features: Visual flow builder: Design conversational flows using a drag-and-drop visual interface without coding.
Conversational forms: Create engaging forms that feel like conversations for better user experience.
Conditional logic: Build dynamic flows that adapt based on user responses and data.
Integrations: Connect with webhooks, APIs, and third-party services for data collection and automation.
Embeddable: Embed chatbots on websites using simple code snippets or iframe integration.
Custom branding: Customize appearance with colors, fonts, and styling to match your brand.
Analytics: Track completion rates, drop-off points, and user responses to optimize flows.
Multi-step forms: Break complex forms into conversational steps for higher completion rates.
Variable system: Store and use variables throughout flows for personalization and logic.
Response validation: Validate user inputs with custom rules to ensure data quality.
Self-hosted or cloud: Deploy on your infrastructure for control or use managed cloud for convenience.
Template library: Start quickly with pre-built templates for common use cases like lead generation or surveys.
